author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #40339

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_6_X`.

It includes the migration of the HLT menus to the `ConfDB` template for `CMSSW_12_6_0`.

This PR includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2583](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2583): [TSG] Review of PS columns in the combined HLT menu
  - [CMSHLT-2586](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2586): [TSG] Move seed of {{DST_HLTMuon_Run3_PFScoutingPixelTracking}} before HLT prescale
  - [CMSHLT-2589](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2589): [JME] Add HLT PFMET collections to "ReleaseValidation" EventContent
  - [CMSHLT-2590](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2590): [B2G] Removal of AK8Jet+TrimMass and AK8PFHT+TrimMass triggers from the combined menu

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#40339

Development of HLT menus for 2023 data-taking.
title: HLT menu development for `12_6_X` (2/N)
